answerText: Troy Maxson [prompt on "Maxson"][10] Troy Maxson is the main character of this play. This play ends with Jim Bono buying a refrigerator to uphold a promise he made that he would buy one when the title structure is completed.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 2 | 3 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This character promises to buy a TV to watch the World Series if his son can supply $100, half the cost of the TV. [10] Name this man who steals money from his brother, Gabriel, and has an affair with the unseen Alberta, who dies in childbirth; this character's wife adopts the baby who later plants seeds in the family's yard.
